mapper.select: SELECT pc.p_counseling_idx, pc.u_idx, pc.p_counseling_ck, pc.p_grade, pc.p_review, pc.counsel_idx, DATE_FORMAT(pc.counsel_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS counselDate, FORMAT(p.p_price , 0) AS p_price, u.u_name, u.u_tel, pi2.p_img_name, pi2.p_img_path, pi2.p_img_type FROM planner_counseling AS pc LEFT JOIN planner AS p on pc.u_idx = p.u_idx LEFT JOIN `user` AS u on p.u_idx = u.u_idx LEFT JOIN planner_img as pi2 on pi2.u_idx = u.u_idx where pc.counsel_idx =#{uIdx} and pi2.p_img_type ='thumbnail' ORDER BY counselDate DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset};
